post.html:
What is Dagger?

Dagger is an abstraction layer that runs on top of Docker.

It is a fairly new tool that was created by some of the same people who created Docker. It is designed to make it easier to define and run pipelines as code.
post.markdown: ## What is Dagger? Dagger is an abstraction layer that runs on top of Docker. It is a fairly new tool that was created by some of the same people who created Docker. It is designed to make it easier to **define and run pipelines as code**.
post.title: What is Dagger?
